title: 2001–02 Ukrainian Cup
text:
The Ukrainian Cup 2001–02 was the 11th annual edition of <a href="Ukraine">Ukraine's</a> <a href="association%20football">football</a> knockout competition, known as the <a href="Ukrainian%20Cup">Ukrainian Cup</a>. The winner of this competition was <a href="Shakhtar%20Donetsk">Shakhtar Donetsk</a>.
Team allocation.
Round and draw dates.
All draws held at FFU headquarters (Building of Football) in <a href="Kyiv">Kyiv</a> unless stated otherwise.
